title: Black screen flicker in game
body:
Every once in a little while my screen will go to black for a couple of frames and it makes things like csing and team fighting somewhat difficult. 
I've reinstalled a few times, tried windowed borderless, and used the hextech repair tool and none of it has worked.

replies.body: It seems like you're still connected to the game but a driver or hardware issue is failing to continue rendering the game.  Start off with the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up.  There is certainly a possibility of a resolution issue or maybe even a bad cable, but you should see a no signal display as a result.  Test it in a custom and let me know how it goes.
Nothing worked. I only have this problem with league and nothing else.

Thanks for trying, but we can still dig a little deeper.  Grab some logs provided by the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a look and work with you directly to get this resolved.  We'll see you there!
